baseline_groups.claim_summary: Mixing behavior varies across decision domains (risk vs ambiguous).
baseline_groups.notes: Coef = -0.25 (p < 0.001). Risk domain has less mixing than ambiguous. N=341.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Individual mixing attitudes predict multiple mixing behavior.
baseline_groups.notes: Individual-level predictor. Generally positive but rarely significant (N=88).

global_notes: Lab experiment with 88 subjects. Main finding is domain comparison (G1), not individual prediction (G2). The ttest/* specs are domain mean comparisons.
